# Want to know Me ? {.unnumbered}
I am **SUBHOJIT MAJI**, a B.Math Undergraduate at [Indian Statistical Institute, Bangalore Centre](https://www.isibang.ac.in/){.highlighted} . My Special Interests are in **Probability Theory** but in no way limited to it .

I am currently a member of the **Cultural Committee** of [ISI Bangalore](https://www.isibang.ac.in/){.highlighted} for the session 2024-25 as well as a member of the **LIMIT** 2024-25 [Design Team](https://www.limitisi.in/resources/team/design){.highlighted} . This site is created by me for sharing some great problems and theoretical stuffs with y'all.

Hope you all would enjoy browsing through it *:)* !!
